title: Radhika Pandit in Kannada Jodhaa Akbar?
text:
She has been having a good time at the movies with noteworthy hits behind her. The mega success of Mr & Mrs Ramachari and a top assignment like Doddamane Huduga with Puneeth Rajkumar have only gone on to add further gravitas to her roster. So you'd be surprised to know that Radhika Pandit isn't too keen on resting on her laurels.
"As an actor, you can never really say you've done it all. I've done my share of girl-next-door kind of roles. Now I really want to play a historic character. I loved Jodhaa Akbar and have been imagining myself in that role ever since I watched the film years ago," says Radhika.
Another issue that's been on her mind lately is women-centric films. "I wish we made more women-oriented movies in Kannada. It'd be nice if more directors came forward to make such subjects without worrying about the moolah it would make," she states. Sandalwood filmmakers, over to you.
